txt.en:
'Three new lists this year! My, my, perhaps this will become a new tradition! I'm afraid there is nothing left to do now but wait until next year and await more from our mystery merrymaker! I wonder if they will ever reveal themselves?

'See you soon, and thanks again for all your help! Here's a final reward for being such a caring friend during all this ruckus. Take care!'

<rgb=#FFFF00>There will be no additional Scavenger Hunt cards this year, but the event will remain open for some time, so that remaining cards can be completed.</rgb>
'Here we are again, friend! I must be honest with you; I have been looking forward to this all year! Quickly, go to the tree, and see what new adventure awaits you!'
The Anniversary Scavenger Hunt -- Year Eleven
Complete a Year Eleven scavenger hunt card for a reward!

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace. When you complete a scavenger hunt, bring the completed card to Waldo Rumble for a reward!
Waldo Rumble can be found next to the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should speak to Waldo Rumble to receive your reward for completing a scavenger hunt card!
